#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int a[10010],i=1,d,k,ans=0,n,j;

int save()
{
  while(!a[i])
  {
   i = i+1;
	   if(i>n)
	    i = i%n;
	    }
   
   return i;
}

int makezero()
{
while(!a[i]){
   i = i+1;
	   if(i>n)
	    i = i%n;
   }
   return i;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for(j = 1;j<=n;j++)
	a[j] = j;
	while(true)
	{
	  k = save();
	 // printf("k %d\n",k);
	   i = i+1;
	   if(i>n)
	    i = i%n;
	  d = makezero();
	//   printf("d %d\n",d);
	  if(d == k)
	  {
	    ans = a[d];
	    break;
	  }
	
	   a[d] = 0;
	   i = i+1;
	   if(i>n)
	    i = i%n;
	}
	printf("%d\n",ans);
	return 0;
}
